name: rifaz-system
description: Sistema de Rifas Online de Alto Desempenho

scripts.dev: bun run --parallel "bun run dev:backend" "bun run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: bun run build:backend && bun run build:frontend
scripts.start: bun run --parallel "bun run start:backend" "bun run start:frontend"
scripts.type-check: bun run type-check:backend && bun run type-check:frontend
scripts.lint: bun run lint:backend && bun run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: bun run lint:fix:backend && bun run lint:fix:frontend
scripts.format: bun run format:backend && bun run format:frontend
scripts.clean: bun run clean:backend && bun run clean:frontend
